original_title: Murcof, Erik Truffaz & Talvin Singh - Montreux Jazz Festival
overview: Murcof, Erik Truffaz and Talvin Singh live at the 2006 Montreux Jazz festival. This is the track RIOS from the album REMEMBRANZA, played as encore.
title: Murcof, Erik Truffaz & Talvin Singh - Montreux Jazz Festival
